66645.「おお <cs_pchero>さんではありませんか。\n まさか ここで お会い:
Oh, isn't it <cs_pchero>? I never thought
I'd see you here!

66646.「王者のこてを必要とする 冒険者がいると\n 不思議な声が心に響いたので 来てみ:
I came because a strange voice echoed in my mind that there were adventurers in need of Champion's Gauntlets, and I came because
.

66647.「メギストリスを危機から救った 恩人である\n <cs_pchero>さんの 導:
Let us go to the great King Epath to be guided
by <cs_pchero>, the benefactors who saved
Megistris from peril.

66648.「像に宿りし エパト王の魂よ。\n メギストリスを守る 偉大な王よ。\n どうか:
O spirit of King Epaphat, who inhabits the
statue. O great king who defends Megistris.
Please answer my call!

66649.<center>我は エパト王……。\nかつて このメギストリスを統治し\n長き:
I am King Epath, who once ruled Megistris, and
who has watched over Megistris for many years.

66650.<center>我が問いに答え 王としての資質を示せ。\nさすれば 貴公を\n始:
Answer my questions and show me your qualities
as a king. Then I will accept you as my guide
to the Beginning Tower.

66652.<center>……我が末裔に問う。\n国とは いかなるものか？: I ask my descendants. What is a country?

66653.「国…………。\n 国とは そこに住む者の幸せを守るものです。:
A country... a country protects the well-being
of those who live there.

66654.<center>……ならば さらに問う。\n王とは いかなるものか？:
Then I ask you a further question. What is a
king?

66655.「王とは 自己を犠牲にしてでも\n 国の発展に 尽くす者のことです。:
A king is a man who's devoted to the
betterment of his country, even at the cost of
his own life.

66656.<center>……なるほど。貴公の考えは わかった。\nだが 王者のこてが眠る:
I see. I see your point. But to pave the way
to the Tower where the Champion's Gauntlets
rest, you'll have to pay a steep price.

66657.<center>代償とは すなわち\n王自らの命を ささげること……。:
The price, in other words, is to give the
king's own life...

66658.<center>貴公のそばにいる その者は この世界を救う\n王者となるに ふさ:
The man by your side is worthy to be the
champion who will save this world.

66659.<center>貴公は 先ほど 国のため\nそこに住む 人々の幸せを守るため\n:
You said earlier that a king sacrifices
himself to protect the happiness of his
country and its people.

66660.<center>ならば 世界のため 人々の幸せのために\n自らの死をもって 王者:
Then, for the sake of the world and the happiness of others, you must die to pave the way for a champion. End your life here and
now.

66664.「私の身に宿る命は 父と母が命がけで\n 私に与えてくれた命。:
The life I carry in my body is the life my
parents risked their lives to give me.

66665.「そして 私は この命で\n この国の人々を守っていくのです。:
And I will use this life to protect the people
of this country.

66666.「ご先祖さまの おっしゃることとはいえ\n そんな要求を のむわけにはいきません:
We cannot accept such a request, even though
our ancestors told us to do so. Please show me
other conditions.

66668.<center>まこと 現世の王に ふさわしき答えなり。\nその若さで そこまで:
A fitting answer for the king of this world. It's admirable that you think so much of your country at such a young age. Now the people
have been blessed with a good king.

66670.<center>貴公を 正当なる王として認めよう。\n我が子孫よ……メギストリス:
I now proclaim you the rightful king. My
offspring you will take care of Megistris.

66671.「<cs_pchero>さん。ぼくが導き手として\n 始まりの塔への道を 開きま:
<cs_pchero>. I will lead the way to the
Beginning Tower.

66672.「その玉を 像に掲げてみてください。: Raise that ball up to the statue.

66673.<cs_pchero>は\nエパト王の像に 次元渡りの玉を掲げた！:
<cs_pchero> raised the Dimensional Jewel
over the King Epat Statue!

66679.<center>しかし 王者が必要とされる時代が\nふたたび 訪れようとは……。:
But I never thought that the time would come
again when a champion would be needed...
Resting time never lasts, does it?

66682.<center>王にも王者にも 恵まれている時代だ。\nいかなる困難が訪れようと:
It is a time blessed with kings and champions. Whatever difficulties may come our way, I believe that those of this age will overcome
them.

66684.<center>よくぞ 守護鬼を倒した。\n貴公こそが 現世の王者にふさわしい。:
Well done, you have defeated the guardian
demon. You are worthy to be the champion of
this world.

66686.<center>まがまがしい邪気に 感づかれる前に\nこの塔は ふたたび 閉ざす:
I will close this Tower once again before the
evil spirit that is so deceitful can sense it.
I will also keep the Dimensional Jewel.

66687.なんと <cs_pchero>が持っていた\n次元渡りの玉が 消えていった！:
Oh my god, the Dimensional Jewel that
<cs_pchero> was holding has vanished!

69783.<cs_pchero>のもとに 天から\n光に包まれた武具が 降りてきた。:
Armaments wrapped in light came down from the
heavens to <cs_pchero>.
